price: 37. Wana ezali sé bomoyi ya biso oyo ya nsé, tozali kofanda mpe tozali kokufa kasi tokosekwa te.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
